segments.source_content:
---
description: Deploy a full-featured blog in no time with Docusaurus.
---
# Blog

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
The blog feature enables you to deploy a full-featured blog in no time.

translations.zh-hant: 部落格功能讓您能快速部署一個功能完整的部落格。

segments.source_content:
:::info

Check the [Blog Plugin API Reference documentation](./api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx) for an exhaustive list of options.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

詳盡的選項清單請參閱 [部落格插件 API 參考文件](./api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Initial setup {#initial-setup}
To set up your site's blog, start by creating a `blog` directory.

translations.zh-hant: 要設定網站的部落格，請先建立一個 `blog` 目錄。

segments.source_content: Then, add an item link to your blog within `docusaurus.config.js`:

translations.zh-hant: 接著，在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中加入部落格的連結項目：

segments.source_content: ## Adding posts {#adding-posts}
To publish in the blog, create a Markdown file within the blog directory.

translations.zh-hant: 要在部落格發佈文章，請在部落格目錄中建立 Markdown 檔案。

segments.source_content: For example, create a file at `website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus-v2.md`:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，建立一個位於 `website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus-v2.md` 的檔案：

segments.source_content:
```md title="website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus-v2.md"
---
title: Welcome Docusaurus v2
description: This is my first post on Docusaurus 2.
slug: welcome-docusaurus-v2
authors:
  - name: Joel Marcey
    title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
    url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
    image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
  - name: Sébastien Lorber
    title: Docusaurus maintainer
    url: https://sebastienlorber.com
    image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
tags: [hello, docusaurus-v2]
image: https://i.imgur.com/mErPwqL.png
hide_table_of_contents: false
---

Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with [**Docusaurus 2**](https://docusaurus.io/).

<!--truncate-->

This is my first post on Docusaurus 2.

A whole bunch of exploration to follow.
```

The [front matter](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) is useful to add more metadata to your blog post, for example, author information, but Docusaurus will be able to infer all necessary metadata without the front matter. For all possible fields, see [the API documentation](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter).

translations.zh-hant: [Front Matter](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) 可用於為部落格文章添加更多元資料，例如作者資訊，但即使沒有 front matter，Docusaurus 也能推斷出所有必要的元資料。所有可能的欄位請參閱 [API 文件](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter)。

segments.source_content: ## Blog list {#blog-list}
The blog's index page (by default, it is at `/blog`) is the _blog list page_, where all blog posts are collectively displayed.

translations.zh-hant: 部落格的索引頁面（預設位於 `/blog`）是 _部落格清單頁面_，所有部落格文章會集中顯示在此。

segments.source_content: Use the `<!--truncate-->` marker in your blog post to represent what will be shown as the summary when viewing all published blog posts. Anything above `<!--truncate-->` will be part of the summary. Note that the portion above the truncate marker must be standalone renderable Markdown. For example:

translations.zh-hant: 在部落格文章中使用 `<!--truncate-->` 標記來表示在瀏覽所有已發佈文章時顯示的摘要內容。標記上方的所有內容將成為摘要的一部分。請注意，截斷標記上方的部分必須是獨立可渲染的 Markdown。例如：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
title: Truncation Example
---

All these will be part of the blog post summary.

Even this.

<!--truncate-->

But anything from here on down will not be.

Not this.

Or this.
```

By default, 10 posts are shown on each blog list page, but you can control pagination with the `postsPerPage` option in the plugin configuration. If you set `postsPerPage: 'ALL'`, pagination will be disabled and all posts will be displayed on the first page. You can also add a meta description to the blog list page for better SEO:

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，每個部落格清單頁面會顯示 10 篇文章，但您可以透過插件配置中的 `postsPerPage` 選項控制分頁。若設定 `postsPerPage: 'ALL'`，將停用分頁功能，所有文章會顯示在第一頁。您也可以為部落格清單頁面添加元描述以提升 SEO：

segments.source_content: ## Blog sidebar {#blog-sidebar}

The blog sidebar displays recent blog posts. The default number of items shown is 5, but you can customize with the `blogSidebarCount` option in the plugin configuration. By setting `blogSidebarCount: 0`, the sidebar will be completely disabled, with the container removed as well. This will increase the width of the main container. Specially, if you have set `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`, _all_ posts will be displayed.

translations.zh-hant: 部落格側邊欄會顯示近期文章。預設顯示 5 篇文章，但可透過插件配置中的 `blogSidebarCount` 選項自訂數量。設定 `blogSidebarCount: 0` 將完全停用側邊欄，並移除容器，這會增加主容器的寬度。特別的是，若設定 `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`，則會顯示 _所有_ 文章。

segments.source_content: You can also alter the sidebar heading text with the `blogSidebarTitle` option. For example, if you have set `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`, instead of the default "Recent posts", you may rather make it say "All posts":

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以透過 `blogSidebarTitle` 選項修改側邊欄標題文字。例如，若您設定 `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`，可以將預設的「近期文章」改為「所有文章」：

segments.source_content: ## Blog post date {#blog-post-date}
Docusaurus will extract a `YYYY-MM-DD` date from a file/folder name such as `YYYY-MM-DD-my-blog-post-title.md`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會從檔案/資料夾名稱（如 `YYYY-MM-DD-my-blog-post-title.md`）中提取 `YYYY-MM-DD` 格式的日期。

segments.source_content:
<details>
<summary>Example supported patterns</summary>

| Pattern | Example |
| --- | --- |
| Single file | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |
| MDX file | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title.mdx` |
| Single folder + `index.md` | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title/index.md` |
| Folder named by date | `2021-05-28/my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Nested folders by date | `2021/05/28/my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Partially nested folders by date | `2021/05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Nested folders + `index.md` | `2021/05/28/my-blog-post-title/index.md` |
| Date in the middle of path | `category/2021/05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |

The date will be excised from the path and appended to the beginning of the URL slug.

</details>

:::tip

Using a folder can be convenient to co-locate blog post images alongside the Markdown file.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用資料夾可方便將部落格文章圖片與 Markdown 檔案存放在同一位置。

:::

segments.source_content: This naming convention is optional, and you can also provide the date as front matter. Since the front matter follows YAML syntax where the datetime notation is supported, you can use front matter if you need more fine-grained publish dates. For example, if you have multiple posts published on the same day, you can order them according to the time of the day:

translations.zh-hant: 此命名慣例為選用功能，您也可以透過 front matter 提供日期。由於 front matter 遵循支援日期時間標記法的 YAML 語法，若需要更精確的發佈時間，可使用 front matter。例如，若同一天有多篇文章發佈，可依照當天時間排序：

segments.source_content:
```md title="earlier-post.md"
---
date: 2021-09-13T10:00
---
```

```md title="later-post.md"
---
date: 2021-09-13T18:00
---
```
## Blog post authors {#blog-post-authors}

Use the `authors` front matter field to declare blog post authors. An author should have at least a `name` or an `image_url`. Docusaurus uses information like `url`, `email`, and `title`, but any other information is allowed.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `authors` 前綴欄位來宣告部落格文章作者。作者至少需包含 `name` 或 `image_url` 屬性。Docusaurus 會使用 `url`、`email` 和 `title` 等資訊，但也允許其他自訂資訊。

segments.source_content: ### Inline authors {#inline-authors}
Blog post authors can be declared directly inside the front matter:

translations.zh-hant: 部落格文章作者可直接在前綴欄位中宣告：

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs groupId="author-front-matter">
<TabItem value="single" label="Single author">
```

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  name: Joel Marcey
  title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
  url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
  image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
  email: jimarcey@gmail.com
---
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="multiple" label="Multiple authors">
```

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - name: Joel Marcey
    title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
    url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
    image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
    email: jimarcey@gmail.com
  - name: Sébastien Lorber
    title: Docusaurus maintainer
    url: https://sebastienlorber.com
    image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
---
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```

:::tip

This option works best to get started, or for casual, irregular authors.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

此選項最適合快速開始使用，或適用於非固定、偶爾投稿的作者。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

Prefer using the `authors` front matter, but the legacy `author_*` front matter remains supported:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
author: Joel Marcey
author_title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
author_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
author_image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
---
```

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

建議優先使用 `authors` 前綴欄位，但仍支援舊版 `author_*` 前綴欄位：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
author: Joel Marcey
author_title: Docusaurus 1 共同創建者
author_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
author_image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
---
```

:::

segments.source_content: ### Global authors {#global-authors}
For regular blog post authors, it can be tedious to maintain authors' information inlined in each blog post.

translations.zh-hant: 對於固定投稿的部落格作者，若要在每篇文章中維護作者資訊會相當繁瑣。

segments.source_content: It is possible to declare those authors globally in a configuration file:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在設定檔中全域宣告這些作者：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="website/blog/authors.yml"
jmarcey:
  name: Joel Marcey
  title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
  url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
  image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
  email: jimarcey@gmail.com

slorber:
  name: Sébastien Lorber
  title: Docusaurus maintainer
  url: https://sebastienlorber.com
  image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
```

:::tip

Use the `authorsMapPath` plugin option to configure the path. JSON is also supported.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用 `authorsMapPath` 插件選項來設定路徑。也支援 JSON 格式。

:::

segments.source_content: In blog posts front matter, you can reference the authors declared in the global configuration file:

translations.zh-hant: 在部落格文章的前綴欄位中，您可以引用全域設定檔中宣告的作者：

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs groupId="author-front-matter">
<TabItem value="single" label="Single author">
```

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors: jmarcey
---
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="multiple" label="Multiple authors">
```

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors: [jmarcey, slorber]
---
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```

:::info

The `authors` system is very flexible and can suit more advanced use-case:

<details>
  <summary>Mix inline authors and global authors</summary>

You can use global authors most of the time, and still use inline authors:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - jmarcey
  - slorber
  - name: Inline Author name
    title: Inline Author Title
    url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
    image_url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Local override of global authors</summary>

You can customize the global author's data on per-blog-post basis:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - key: jmarcey
    title: Joel Marcey's new title
  - key: slorber
    name: Sébastien Lorber's new name
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Localize the author's configuration file</summary>

The configuration file can be localized, just create a localized copy of it at:

```bash
website/i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml
```

</details>

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

`authors` 系統非常靈活，可滿足更進階的使用情境：

<details>
  <summary>混合行內作者與全域作者</summary>

您可以主要使用全域作者，同時仍保留使用行內作者的彈性：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - jmarcey
  - slorber
  - name: 行內作者名稱
    title: 行內作者標題
    url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
    image_url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>覆寫全域作者的本地設定</summary>

您可以針對單篇部落格文章自訂全域作者的資料：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - key: jmarcey
    title: Joel Marcey 的新標題
  - key: slorber
    name: Sébastien Lorber 的新名稱
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>本地化作者設定檔</summary>

設定檔可進行本地化，只需在以下路徑建立本地化副本：

```bash
website/i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml
```

</details>

:::

segments.source_content: An author, either declared through front matter or through the authors map, needs to have a name or an avatar, or both. If all authors of a post don't have names, Docusaurus will display their avatars compactly. See [this test post](/tests/blog/2022/01/20/image-only-authors) for the effect.

translations.zh-hant: 無論是透過前綴欄位或作者對照表宣告的作者，都必須具備名稱或頭像（或兩者皆有）。若文章所有作者皆未提供名稱，Docusaurus 會以緊湊方式顯示其頭像。效果請參見[此測試文章](/tests/blog/2022/01/20/image-only-authors)。

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Feed generation]

[RSS feeds](#feed) require the author's email to be set for the author to appear in the feed.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning[訂閱源生成]

[RSS 訂閱源](#feed)要求必須設定作者的電子郵件，作者才會出現在訂閱源中。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Reading time {#reading-time}
Docusaurus generates a reading time estimation for each blog post based on word count. We provide an option to customize this.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會根據字數為每篇部落格文章生成閱讀時間估算。我們提供選項供您自訂此功能。

segments.source_content: The `readingTime` callback receives three parameters: the blog content text as a string, front matter as a record of string keys and their values, and the default reading time function. It returns a number (reading time in minutes) or `undefined` (disable reading time for this page).

translations.zh-hant: `readingTime` 回調函數接收三個參數：部落格內容文字（字串形式）、前端資料（鍵值對記錄）以及預設閱讀時間計算函數。它會返回一個數字（閱讀時間分鐘數）或 `undefined`（停用該頁面的閱讀時間顯示）。

segments.source_content: The default reading time is able to accept additional options: `wordsPerMinute` as a number (default: 300), and `wordBound` as a function from string to boolean. If the string passed to `wordBound` should be a word bound (spaces, tabs, and line breaks by default), the function should return `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 預設閱讀時間計算可接受額外選項：`wordsPerMinute`（數字，預設值：300）和 `wordBound`（字串轉布林值的函數）。當傳入 `wordBound` 的字串應被視為單詞邊界（預設包含空格、製表符和換行符）時，該函數應返回 `true`。

segments.source_content: ## Feed {#feed}
You can generate RSS / Atom / JSON feed by passing `feedOptions`. By default, RSS and Atom feeds are generated. To disable feed generation, set `feedOptions.type` to `null`.

translations.zh-hant: 透過設定 `feedOptions` 可生成 RSS/Atom/JSON 訂閱源。預設會生成 RSS 和 Atom 訂閱源。若要停用訂閱源生成，請將 `feedOptions.type` 設為 `null`。

segments.source_content: Example usage:
The feeds can be found at:

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="RSS">

```text
https://example.com/blog/rss.xml
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="Atom">

```text
https://example.com/blog/atom.xml
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="JSON">

```text
https://example.com/blog/feed.json
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
## Advanced topics {#advanced-topics}
### Blog-only mode {#blog-only-mode}

You can run your Docusaurus 2 site without a dedicated landing page and instead have your blog's post list page as the index page. Set the `routeBasePath` to be `'/'` to serve the blog through the root route `example.com/` instead of the subroute `example.com/blog/`.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以讓部落格文章列表頁取代首頁，無需專用登陸頁面。將 `routeBasePath` 設為 `'/'` 即可透過根路徑 `example.com/` 存取部落格（而非子路徑 `example.com/blog/`）。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Don't forget to delete the existing homepage at `./src/pages/index.js` or else there will be two files mapping to the same route!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

請務必刪除現有的首頁檔案 `./src/pages/index.js`，否則會出現兩個檔案映射到相同路由的情況！

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

There's also a "Docs-only mode" for those who only want to use the docs. Read [Docs-only mode](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx) for detailed instructions or a more elaborate explanation of `routeBasePath`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

另有「純文檔模式」可供僅需文檔功能的用戶使用。詳見[純文檔模式](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx)的詳細說明或關於 `routeBasePath` 的更完整解釋。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Multiple blogs {#multiple-blogs}

By default, the classic theme assumes only one blog per website and hence includes only one instance of the blog plugin. If you would like to have multiple blogs on a single website, it's possible too! You can add another blog by specifying another blog plugin in the `plugins` option for `docusaurus.config.js`.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，經典主題假設每個網站僅有一個部落格，因此僅包含一個部落格外掛程式實例。若您希望在單一網站上擁有多個部落格，這同樣可行！您可以透過在 `docusaurus.config.js` 的 `plugins` 選項中指定另一個部落格外掛程式來新增第二個部落格。

segments.source_content: Set the `routeBasePath` to the URL route that you want your second blog to be accessed on. Note that the `routeBasePath` here has to be different from the first blog or else there could be a collision of paths! Also, set `path` to the path to the directory containing your second blog's entries.

translations.zh-hant: 將 `routeBasePath` 設定為您希望第二個部落格被存取的 URL 路由。請注意，此處的 `routeBasePath` 必須與第一個部落格不同，否則可能發生路徑衝突！同時，將 `path` 設定為包含您第二個部落格條目的目錄路徑。

segments.source_content: As documented for [multi-instance plugins](./using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids), you need to assign a unique ID to the plugins.

translations.zh-hant: 如[多實例外掛程式](./using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids)文件所述，您需要為這些外掛程式分配唯一 ID。

segments.source_content: As an example, we host a second blog [here](/tests/blog).

translations.zh-hant: 作為範例，我們在此處託管了第二個部落格 [/tests/blog](/tests/blog)。
